p: Women commonly seek permission from their husbands before they can access health care. FGD participants mentioned that when some men discover they are HIV positive, they prevent their wives from seeking HIV testing services or even go for services for the prevention of mother to child transmission of HIV for fear of their HIV status being discovered. As one participant mentioned; “ I think they (men) fear that if the woman tests HIV positive, then she will know where the virus came from….” FGD-33 Female participant in the island district of Kalangala.
